PromoSection.title: Always guaranteed a taxi for business or private services
PromoSection.intro: Do you need to travel often for work or private purposes? In a busy city, you lose a lot of time due to traffic delays and searching for a parking spot. It can be easier.
PromoSection.description: By partnering with AmstaxiHolland, you can be sure that a taxi in Amsterdam is always ready for you the moment you need one.
benefits: No more delays in busy city traffic
No need to search for parking
Always a taxi nearby, always available
Extra competitive prices with contractual partnership
PromoSection.imageAlt: Luxury Mercedes E-Class with private chauffeur for business rides in Amsterdam

toursSection.title: Discover Amsterdam in Style
toursSection.subtitle: Exclusive tours with private chauffeur
toursSection.description: Experience Amsterdam like a local with our personalized tours.
